name: Sonic RPG REMAKE
description:
Crystal appear! Tell Sonic Hedgehog he must kill Egg Doctor. Journey with Sonic Hedgehog, Mile "Tail" Fox, Knuckle Kid, and Shadow Edgehog and meet people to help your journey of defeat egg doctor!
